alert.note: Alert for Cullman (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 4:57PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cullman County through 530 PM CDT... At 456 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Good Hope, or 7 miles west of Cullman, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baldwin, West Point, Jones Chapel and Logan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
